verses.verse: וַיָּ֣שֶׁב <WH7725> Then he brought me back אֹתִ֗י <WH853> דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> the way שַׁ֤עַר <WH8179> of the gate הַמִּקְדָּשׁ֙ <WH4720> sanctuary הַֽחִיצ֔וֹן <WH2435> of the outward הַפֹּנֶ֖ה <WH6437> which looketh קָדִ֑ים <WH6921> toward the east וְה֖וּא <WH1931> and it was סָגֽוּר׃ <WH5462> and it [was] shut

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֵלַ֜י <WH413> about יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD הַשַּׁ֣עַר <WH8179> unto me This gate הַזֶּה֩ <WH2088> This סָג֨וּר <WH5462> shall be shut יִהְיֶ֜ה <WH1961> become לֹ֣א <WH3808> and no יִפָּתֵ֗חַ <WH6605> it shall not be opened וְאִישׁ֙ <WH376> and no man לֹא־ <WH3808> and no יָ֣בֹא <WH935> shall enter ב֔וֹ כִּ֛י <WH3588> for יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> in by it because the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בָּ֣א <WH935> hath entered ב֑וֹ וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become סָגֽוּר׃ <WH5462> in by it therefore it shall be shut

אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַנָּשִׂ֗יא <WH5387> [It is] for the prince נָ֥שִׂיא <WH5387> the prince ה֛וּא <WH1931> he יֵֽשֶׁב־ <WH3427> he shall sit בּ֥וֹ [לֶאֱכֹול־ כ] (לֶאֱכָל־ <WH398> to eat לֶ֖חֶם <WH398> in it to eat ק) לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD מִדֶּ֨רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way אֻלָ֤ם <WH197> of the porch הַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <WH8179> of [that] gate יָב֔וֹא <WH935> he shall enter וּמִדַּרְכּ֖וֹ <WH1870> by the way יֵצֵֽא׃ <WH3318> and shall go out

וַיְבִיאֵ֜נִי <WH935> Then brought דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <WH1870> he me the way שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate הַצָּפוֹן֮ <WH6828> of the north אֶל־ <WH413> to פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הַבַּיִת֒ <WH1004> the house וָאֵ֕רֶא <WH7200> and I looked וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> and behold מָלֵ֥א <WH4390> filled כְבוֹד־ <WH3519> and behold the glory יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וָאֶפֹּ֖ל <WH5307> and I fell אֶל־ <WH413> on פָּנָֽי׃ <WH6440> upon my face

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלַ֜י <WH413> about יְהֹוָ֗ה <WH3068> And the LORD בֶּן־ <WH1121> unto me Son אָדָ֡ם <WH120> of man שִׂ֣ים <WH7760> mark לִבְּךָ֩ <WH3820> well וּרְאֵ֨ה <WH7200> and behold בְעֵינֶ֜יךָ <WH5869> with thine eyes וּבְאָזְנֶ֣יךָ <WH241> with thine ears שְּׁמָ֗ע <WH8085> and hear אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> that אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I מְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> all that I say אֹתָ֔ךְ <WH853> לְכָל־ <WH3605> all חֻקּ֥וֹת <WH2708> unto thee concerning all the ordinances בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> all [תֹּורֹתֹו כ] (תֹּֽורֹתָ֑יו <WH8451> bullock ק) וְשַׂמְתָּ֤ <WH7760> thereof and mark לִבְּךָ֙ <WH3820> well לִמְב֣וֹא <WH3996> the entering in הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> of the house בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all מוֹצָאֵ֥י <WH4161> with every going forth הַמִּקְדָּֽשׁ׃ <WH4720> of the sanctuary

וְאָמַרְתָּ֤ <WH559> And thou shalt say אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֙רִי֙ <WH4805> to the rebellious אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> [even] to the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD רַב־ <WH7227> let it suffice לָכֶ֛ם מִֽכָּל־ <WH3605> of all תּוֹעֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH8441> you of all your abominations בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> O ye house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

בַּהֲבִיאֲכֶ֣ם <WH935> In that ye have brought בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> afflicted נֵכָ֗ר <WH5236> alien עַרְלֵי־ <WH6189> uncircumcised לֵב֙ <WH3820> in heart וְעַרְלֵ֣י <WH6189> and uncircumcised בָשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> in flesh לִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> to be in בְּמִקְדָּשִׁ֖י <WH4720> to be in my sanctuary לְחַלְּל֣וֹ <WH2490> to pollute אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּיתִ֑י <WH1004> it [even] my house בְּהַקְרִֽיבְכֶ֤ם <WH7126> when ye offer אֶת־ <WH853> לַחְמִי֙ <WH3899> my bread חֵ֣לֶב <WH2459> the fat וָדָ֔ם <WH1818> and the blood וַיָּפֵ֙רוּ֙ <WH6565> and they have broken אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִ֔י <WH1285> my covenant אֶ֖ל <WH413> because כָּל־ <WH3605> to all תּוֹעֲבוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH8441> of all your abominations

וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> have not שְׁמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH8104> And ye have not kept מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת <WH4931> the charge קָדָשָׁ֑י <WH6944> of mine holy things וַתְּשִׂימ֗וּן <WH7760> but ye have set לְשֹׁמְרֵ֧י <WH8104> keepers מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֛י <WH4931> of my charge בְּמִקְדָּשִׁ֖י <WH4720> in my sanctuary לָכֶֽם׃

כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3068> GOD כָּל־ <WH3605> of all בֶּן־ <WH1121> the children נֵכָ֗ר <WH5236> alien עֶ֤רֶל <WH6189> uncircumcised לֵב֙ <WH3820> in heart וְעֶ֣רֶל <WH6189> nor uncircumcised בָּשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> in flesh לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָב֖וֹא <WH935> shall enter אֶל־ <WH413> about מִקְדָּשִׁ֑י <WH4720> into my sanctuary לְכָל־ <WH3605> of all בֶּן־ <WH1121> the sons נֵכָ֔ר <WH5236> alien אֲשֶׁ֕ר <WH834> who בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> of any stranger that [is] among בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the sons יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> And the Levites אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who רָֽחֲקוּ֙ <WH7368> that are gone away far מֵֽעָלַ֔י <WH5921> and בִּתְע֤וֹת <WH8582> went astray יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> from me when Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who תָּע֣וּ <WH8582> which went astray away מֵֽעָלַ֔י <WH5921> and אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> from me after גִּלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1544> their idols וְנָשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> they shall even bear עֲוֹנָֽם׃ <WH5771> their iniquity

וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> become בְמִקְדָּשִׁי֙ <WH4720> in my sanctuary מְשָׁ֣רְתִ֔ים <WH8334> Yet they shall be ministers פְּקֻדּוֹת֙ <WH6486> [having] charge אֶל־ <WH413> at שַׁעֲרֵ֣י <WH8179> at the gates הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> of the house וּֽמְשָׁרְתִ֖ים <WH8334> and ministering אֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> to the house הֵ֠מָּה <WH1992> they יִשְׁחֲט֨וּ <WH7819> they shall slay אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹלָ֤ה <WH5930> the burnt offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַזֶּ֙בַח֙ <WH2077> and the sacrifice לָעָ֔ם <WH5971> for the people וְהֵ֛מָּה <WH1992> and they יַעַמְד֥וּ <WH5975> and they shall stand לִפְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6440> before לְשָֽׁרְתָֽם׃ <WH8334> them to minister

יַ֗עַן <WH3282> because אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> they יְשָׁרְת֤וּ <WH8334> Because they ministered אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> unto them before גִלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1544> their idols וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> and became לְבֵֽית־ <WH1004> and caused the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לְמִכְשׁ֣וֹל <WH4383> to fall עָוֹ֑ן <WH5771> into iniquity עַל־ <WH5921> against כֵּן֩ <WH3651> after that נָשָׂ֨אתִי <WH5375> therefore have I lifted up יָדִ֜י <WH3027> mine hand עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5921> against נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> against them saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD וְנָשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> and they shall bear עֲוֹנָֽם׃ <WH5771> their iniquity

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יִגְּשׁ֤וּ <WH5066> And they shall not come near אֵלַי֙ <WH413> to me לְכַהֵ֣ן <WH3547> unto me to do the office of a priest לִ֔י וְלָגֶ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH5066> unto me nor to come near עַל־ <WH5921> unto כָּל־ <WH3605> any קָ֣דָשַׁ֔י <WH6944> to any of my holy things אֶל־ <WH413> about קָדְשֵׁ֖י <WH6944> in the most holy הַקְּדָשִׁ֑ים <WH6944> to the things וְנָֽשְׂאוּ֙ <WH5375> [place] but they shall bear כְּלִמָּתָ֔ם <WH3639> their shame וְתוֹעֲבוֹתָ֖ם <WH8441> and their abominations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> which they have committed

וְנָתַתִּ֣י <WH5414> But I will make אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> שֹׁמְרֵ֖י <WH8104> them keepers מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת <WH4931> of the charge הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> of the house לְכֹל֙ <WH3605> of all עֲבֹ֣דָת֔וֹ <WH5656> for all the service וּלְכֹ֛ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that יֵעָשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> thereof and for all that shall be done בּֽוֹ׃ פ

וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֨ים <WH3548> But the priests הַלְוִיִּ֜ם <WH3881> the Levites בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the sons צָד֗וֹק <WH6659> of Zadok אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who שָׁמְר֜וּ <WH8104> that kept אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁמֶ֤רֶת <WH4931> the charge מִקְדָּשִׁי֙ <WH4720> of my sanctuary בִּתְע֤וֹת <WH8582> went astray בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> when the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel מֵֽעָלַ֔י <WH5921> and הֵ֛מָּה <WH1992> like יִקְרְב֥וּ <WH7126> from me they shall come near אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me לְשָֽׁרְתֵ֑נִי <WH8334> to me to minister וְעָמְד֣וּ <WH5975> unto me and they shall stand לְפָנַ֗י <WH6440> before לְהַקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> me to offer לִי֙ חֵ֣לֶב <WH2459> unto me the fat וָדָ֔ם <WH1818> and the blood נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

הֵ֜מָּה <WH1992> They יָבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> They shall enter אֶל־ <WH413> about מִקְדָּשִׁ֗י <WH4720> into my sanctuary וְהֵ֛מָּה <WH1992> they יִקְרְב֥וּ <WH7126> and they shall come near אֶל־ <WH413> to שֻׁלְחָנִ֖י <WH7979> to my table לְשָׁרְתֵ֑נִי <WH8334> to minister וְשָׁמְר֖וּ <WH8104> unto me and they shall keep אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁמַרְתִּֽי׃ <WH4931> my charge

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become בְּבוֹאָם֙ <WH935> And it shall come to pass [that] when they enter אֶֽל־ <WH413> at שַׁעֲרֵי֙ <WH8179> in at the gates הֶחָצֵ֣ר <WH2691> court הַפְּנִימִ֔ית <WH6442> of the inner בִּגְדֵ֥י <WH899> garments פִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6593> with linen יִלְבָּ֑שׁוּ <WH3847> they shall be clothed וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יַעֲלֶ֤ה <WH5927> shall come עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH5921> and צֶ֔מֶר <WH6785> and no wool בְּשָֽׁרְתָ֗ם <WH8334> upon them whiles they minister בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֛י <WH8179> in the gates הֶחָצֵ֥ר <WH2691> court הַפְּנִימִ֖ית <WH6442> of the inner וָבָֽיְתָה׃ <WH1004> and within

פַּאֲרֵ֤י <WH6287> bonnets פִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6593> They shall have linen יִהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> upon רֹאשָׁ֔ם <WH7218> upon their heads וּמִכְנְסֵ֣י <WH4370> breeches פִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6593> and shall have linen יִהְי֖וּ <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> upon מָתְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH4975> upon their loins לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not יַחְגְּר֖וּ <WH2296> they shall not gird בַּיָּֽזַע׃ <WH3154> [themselves] with any thing that causeth sweat

וּ֠בְצֵאתָם <WH3318> And when they go forth אֶל־ <WH413> about הֶחָצֵ֨ר <WH2691> court הַחִיצוֹנָ֜ה <WH2435> into the utter אֶל־ <WH413> about הֶחָצֵ֣ר <WH2691> court הַחִיצוֹנָה֮ <WH2435> [even] into the utter אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָם֒ <WH5971> to the people יִפְשְׁט֣וּ <WH6584> they shall put off אֶת־ <WH853> בִּגְדֵיהֶ֗ם <WH899> their garments אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> they מְשָׁרְתִ֣ם <WH8334> wherein they ministered בָּ֔ם וְהִנִּ֥יחוּ <WH3240> and lay אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בְּלִֽשְׁכֹ֣ת <WH3957> chambers הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> them in the holy וְלָֽבְשׁוּ֙ <WH3847> and they shall put בְּגָדִ֣ים <WH899> garments אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> on other וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> so יְקַדְּשׁ֥וּ <WH6942> and they shall not sanctify אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> the people בְּבִגְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH899> with their garments

וְרֹאשָׁם֙ <WH7218> their heads לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not יְגַלֵּ֔חוּ <WH1548> Neither shall they shave וּפֶ֖רַע <WH6545> nor suffer their locks לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יְשַׁלֵּ֑חוּ <WH7971> to grow long כָּס֥וֹם <WH3697> they shall only יִכְסְמ֖וּ <WH3697> poll אֶת־ <WH853> רָאשֵׁיהֶֽם׃ <WH7218> their heads

וְיַ֥יִן <WH3196> wine לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor יִשְׁתּ֖וּ <WH8354> drink כָּל־ <WH3605> shall any כֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> Neither shall any priest בְּבוֹאָ֖ם <WH935> when they enter אֶל־ <WH413> about הֶחָצֵ֥ר <WH2691> court הַפְּנִימִֽית׃ <WH6442> into the inner

וְאַלְמָנָה֙ <WH490> a widow וּגְרוּשָׁ֔ה <WH1644> nor her that is put away לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not יִקְח֥וּ <WH3947> Neither shall they take לָהֶ֖ם לְנָשִׁ֑ים <WH802> for their wives כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo בְּתוּלֹ֗ת <WH1330> maidens מִזֶּ֙רַע֙ <WH2233> of the seed בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְהָֽאַלְמָנָה֙ <WH2233> the offspring אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who תִּֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become אַלְמָנָ֔ה <WH490> or a widow מִכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> that had a priest יִקָּֽחוּ׃ <WH3947> but they shall take

וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> my people יוֹר֔וּ <WH3384> And they shall teach בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> [the difference] between the holy לְחֹ֑ל <WH2455> and profane וּבֵין־ <WH996> between טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> between the unclean לְטָה֖וֹר <WH2889> and the clean יוֹדִעֻֽם׃ <WH3045> and cause them to discern
